title: PM condoles death of Saudi Prince Fahd bin Muqrinâ€™s mother
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 22 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif on Friday expressed condolences on the passing of the mother of Saudi Prince Fahd bin Muqrin bin Abdulaziz Al Saud.
The prime minister, in a statement, conveyed his condolence to the Saudi royal family.
He also prayed for the peace for the departed soul and strength for the bereaved family to bear the loss.
